title: Aleph is currently unavailable
safeHtmlBody: Aleph is currently unavailable. We’re currently investigating and will post an update once we’ve identified the cause.

title: Planned downtime on Sun, 2022-07-10, 9-10am CET
safeHtmlBody: We will upgrade our server infrastructure to ensure Aleph can continue to handle increasing workloads. Aleph will be unavailable during this time frame.

title: Resolved: Degraded ingest performance
safeHtmlBody: Processing ingested files currently takes longer than usual. We’re currently investigating the issue and will post an update once we’ve identified the cause.

updates.safeHtmlBody: We have identified the issue and are currently working on a fix.
Aleph is processing documents at full speed again. If you have previously uploaded documents that haven’t been processed correctly, you might need to reupload them.
